channel.title: BurstScape (NEW!)
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/4ld.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/7545/4ld.png[/img][/URL]
What BurstScape is and what we can offer?
Burstscape is a 718, we offer a realistic and enjoyable gameplay. All our content its working and we have amazing futures that i will show below. We also offer a prefect economy with a great pking and skilling.
[size=10pt] Links [/size] Mainpage: Under construction (almost finished need few things more) Webclient: [url=http://www.burstscape.info]burstscape.info[/url] Forums: [url=http://burstscape.createaforum.com]burstscape.createaforum.com[/url]
Features:
- Perfect Skilling and pking - No downtime - Great Economy - Lots of minigames (clan wars,castle wars, etc) and bosses (nex,tmd,corp,qbd,etc) - Experienced coders/owners - Domain (.info) with Mainpage (almost finished), webclient,forums. - Max-Comp cape with each cape emote. - Help support 24/7 - Daily updates and big ones coming (Highscores,Dung,etc) - Frequent events (Drop party,hns,team for bosses,clan wars fights) - Much more!
[size=12pt] Pictures![/size]
[size=10pt]General Ones:[/size]

item.description:
@lunar_x wrote:

                                         What BurstScape is and what we can offer?

  Burstscape is a 718, we offer a realistic and enjoyable gameplay.
  All our content its working and we have amazing futures that i will show below.
  We also offer a prefect economy with a great pking and skilling.

                      [size=10pt]      Links

[/size]
Mainpage: Under construction (almost finished need few things more)
Webclient: burstscape.info
Forums: burstscape.createaforum.com

                                            Features:

  • Perfect Skilling and pking

  • No downtime

  • Great Economy

  • Lots of minigames (clan wars,castle wars, etc) and bosses (nex,tmd,corp,qbd,etc)

  • Experienced coders/owners

  • Domain (.info) with Mainpage (almost finished), webclient,forums.

  • Max-Comp cape with each cape emote.

  • Help support 24/7

  • Daily updates and big ones coming (Highscores,Dung,etc)

  • Frequent events (Drop party,hns,team for bosses,clan wars fights)

  • Much more!
